name: XML User Interface Language File
summary: An XUL file is a file used to create user interface elements for applications, primarily within Mozilla products like the Firefox web browser. It is saved in the XML User Interface Language (XUL), which is a simple markup language in the XML standard that defines windows, menus, buttons, and other interface components. XUL files allow developers to design the layout and behavior of an application's interface in a clear and structured way.
